original_title: FLOSS Weekly Episode 843: Money Usually Helps
original_content:
This week Jonathan and Dan chat with Farid Abdelnour about Kdenlive! Its top quality video editing software, and happens to be what we use to edit the show! Whats next for the project, and how can you help? Watch to find out!


https://kdenlive.org/
https://kdenlive.org/news/releases/25.08.0/
https://www.estudio.gunga.com.br/


Did you know you can watch the live recording of the show right on our YouTube Channel? Have someone youd like us to interview? Let us know, or contact the guest and have them contact us! Take a look at the schedule here.

Direct Download in DRM-free MP3.
If youd rather read along, heres the transcript for this weeks episode.
Places to follow the FLOSS Weekly Podcast:

title: - Kdenliveの魅力：高品質な動画編集ソフトウェアの紹介
body: 今週のFLOSS WeeklyではKdenliveの動画編集ソフトについて語る。次のプロジェクトや支援方法も紹介。
titles: - Kdenliveの魅力：高品質な動画編集ソフトウェアの紹介
- 次なるKdenliveプロジェクトとは？あなたの協力方法を探る

- YouTubeでライブ録画を楽しむ：FLOSS Weeklyの最新エピソード
- インタビュー希望者募集：Kdenliveについて語ろう
